entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
